{Scorpina}

    Scorpina shook her head and snarled as she transformed, the dark brown
scorpion that was her beast mode skittered forward the stinging tail swaying
back and forth. The sharp tip glowed with a purplish ooze, the venom she now
used would induce paralysis for a small amount of time vs such a large bot
but if this new leader of hers wanted the thing captured, best not to kill
it...
